response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This extraordinary piece holds immense value for us, but we believe it could also be a game-changer for your business. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive unparalleled quality and benefits while also making the investment within your budget considerations. We trust that you will find the product's capabilities to be invaluable to your operations. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity work for both of us.", "product_price": 1200000}
